verses.verse: King <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> was king <WH4428> over all Israel. <WH3478>
These were the princes <WH8269> whom he had: <WH5838> Azariah the son <WH1121> of Zadok, <WH6659> the priest; <WH3548>
Elihoreph <WH456> and Ahijah, <WH281> the sons <WH1121> of Shisha, <WH7894> scribes; <WH5608> Jehoshaphat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Ahilud, <WH286> the recorder; <WH2142>
and Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077> was over the army; <WH6635> and Zadok <WH6659> and Abiathar <WH54> were priests; <WH3548>

and Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Nathan <WH5416> was over the officers; <WH5324> and Zabud <WH2071> the son <WH1121> of Nathan <WH5416> was chief minister, <WH3548> the king <WH4428>'s friend; <WH7463>
and Ahishar <WH301> was over the household; <WH1004> and Adoniram <WH141> the son <WH1121> of Abda <WH5653> was over the men subject to forced labor. <WH4522>

Solomon <WH8010> had twelve <WH8147> officers <WH5324> over all Israel, <WH3478> who provided food <WH3557> for the king <WH4428> and his household: <WH1004> each man <WH259> had to make provision <WH3557> for a month <WH2320> in the year. <WH8141>
These are their names: <WH8034> Ben Hur, <WH1133> in the hill <WH2022> country of Ephraim; <WH669>
Ben Deker, <WH1128> in Makaz, <WH4739> and in Shaalbim, <WH8169> and Beth Shemesh, <WH1053> and Elon Beth Hanan; <WH358>
Ben Hesed, <WH1136> in Arubboth <WH700> (to him belonged Socoh, <WH7755> and all the land <WH776> of Hepher <WH2660>);
Ben Abinadab, <WH1125> in all the height <WH5299> of Dor <WH1756> (he had Taphath <WH2955> the daughter <WH1323> of Solomon <WH8010> as wife <WH802>);

Baana <WH1195> the son <WH1121> of Ahilud, <WH286> in Taanach <WH8590> and Megiddo, <WH4023> and all Beth Shean <WH1052> which is beside <WH681> Zarethan, <WH6891> beneath Jezreel, <WH3157> from Beth Shean <WH1052> to Abel Meholah, <WH65> as far as beyond <WH5676> Jokmeam; <WH3361>

Ben Geber, <WH1127> in Ramoth Gilead <WH1568> (to him belonged the towns <WH2333> of Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> which are in Gilead; <WH1568> to him belonged the region <WH2256> of Argob, <WH709> which is in Bashan, <WH1316> sixty <WH8346> great <WH1419> cities <WH5892> with walls <WH2346> and bronze <WH5178> bars <WH1280>);
Ahinadab <WH292> the son <WH1121> of Iddo, <WH5714> in Mahanaim; <WH4266>
Ahimaaz, <WH290> in Naphtali <WH5321> (he also took <WH3947> Basemath <WH1315> the daughter <WH1323> of Solomon <WH8010> as wife <WH802>);
Baana <WH1195> the son <WH1121> of Hushai, <WH2365> in Asher <WH836> and Bealoth; <WH1175>
Jehoshaphat <WH3092> the son <WH1121> of Paruah, <WH6515> in Issachar; <WH3485>
Shimei <WH8096> the son <WH1121> of Ela, <WH414> in Benjamin; <WH1144>

Geber <WH1398> the son <WH1121> of Uri, <WH221> in the land <WH776> of Gilead, <WH1568> the country <WH776> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> and of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan; <WH1316> and he was the only <WH259> officer <WH5333> who was in the land. <WH776>
Judah <WH3063> and Israel <WH3478> were many <WH7227> as the sand <WH2344> which is by the sea <WH3220> in multitude, <WH7230> eating <WH398> and drinking <WH8354> and making merry. <WH8056>

Solomon <WH8010> ruled <WH4910> over all the kingdoms <WH4467> from the River <WH5104> to the land <WH776> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and to the border <WH1366> of Egypt: <WH4714> they brought <WH5066> tribute, <WH4503> and served <WH5647> Solomon <WH8010> all the days <WH3117> of his life. <WH2416>
Solomon <WH8010>'s provision <WH3899> for one <WH259> day <WH3117> was thirty <WH7970> measures <WH3734> of fine flour, <WH5560> and sixty <WH8346> measures <WH3734> of meal, <WH7058>

ten <WH6235> head of fat <WH1277> cattle, <WH1241> and twenty <WH6242> head of cattle <WH1241> out of the pastures, <WH7471> and one hundred <WH3967> sheep, <WH6629> besides harts, <WH354> and gazelles, <WH3180> and roebucks, <WH6643> and fattened <WH75> fowl. <WH1257>

For he had dominion <WH7287> over all on this side <WH5676> the River, <WH5104> from Tiphsah <WH8607> even to Gaza, <WH5804> over all the kings <WH4428> on this side <WH5676> the River: <WH5104> and he had peace <WH7965> on all sides <WH5650> around him. <WH5439>

Judah <WH3063> and Israel <WH3478> lived <WH3427> safely, <WH983> every man <WH376> under his vine <WH1612> and under his fig tree, <WH8384> from Dan <WH1835> even to Beersheba, <WH884> all the days <WH3117> of Solomon. <WH8010>
Solomon <WH8010> had forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> stalls <WH723> of horses <WH5483> for his chariots, <WH4817> and twelve <WH8147> thousand <WH505> horsemen. <WH6571>

Those officers <WH5324> provided food <WH3557> for king <WH4428> Solomon, <WH8010> and for all who came <WH7131> to king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010>'s table, <WH7979> every man <WH376> in his month; <WH2320> they let nothing <WH1697> be lacking. <WH5737>

Barley <WH8184> also and straw <WH8401> for the horses <WH5483> and swift steeds <WH7409> brought <WH935> they to the place <WH4725> where the officers were, <WH376> every man according to his duty. <WH4941>

God <WH430> gave <WH5414> Solomon <WH8010> wisdom <WH2451> and understanding <WH8394> exceeding <WH3966> much, <WH7235> and very great <WH7341> understanding, <WH3820> even as the sand <WH2344> that is on the <WH3220> seashore. <WH3220>
Solomon <WH8010>'s wisdom <WH2451> excelled <WH7235> the wisdom <WH2451> of all the children <WH1121> of the east, <WH6924> and all the wisdom <WH2451> of Egypt. <WH4714>

For he was wiser <WH2449> than all men; <WH120> than Ethan <WH387> the Ezrahite, <WH250> and Heman, <WH1968> and Calcol, <WH3633> and Darda, <WH1862> the sons <WH1121> of Mahol: <WH4235> and his fame <WH8034> was in all the nations <WH1471> all around. <WH5439>
He spoke <WH1696> three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> proverbs; <WH4912> and his songs <WH7892> were one thousand <WH505> five. <WH2568>

He spoke <WH1696> of trees, <WH6086> from the cedar <WH730> that is in Lebanon <WH3844> even to the hyssop <WH231> that springs out <WH3318> of the wall; <WH7023> he spoke <WH1696> also of animals, <WH929> and of birds, <WH5775> and of creeping things, <WH7431> and of fish. <WH1709>
There came <WH935> of all peoples <WH5971> to hear <WH8085> the wisdom <WH2451> of Solomon, <WH8010> from all kings <WH4428> of the earth, <WH776> who had heard <WH8085> of his wisdom. <WH2451>
